name: Creative Tech Summit 2025
description: Join leading tech innovators and creative minds for a day of inspiring talks, hands-on workshops, and networking opportunities.

name: Dhaka Art Expo
description: A vibrant showcase of local and international artists featuring paintings, sculptures, and digital art.

name: Startup Networking Night
description: Connect with startup founders, investors, and mentors in a casual evening of idea exchange and collaboration.

name: Code Warriors Hackathon
description: A 24-hour coding competition for developers to build innovative software solutions and win exciting prizes.

name: Classical Music Evening
description: Enjoy a soothing evening with performances from renowned classical musicians and vocalists.

name: Sustainable Living Fair
description: Learn about eco-friendly living through exhibitions, workshops, and green product showcases.
